name: Not Alone (Eduard400)
description:
Hi!

Thanks for checking out my game "Not alone"

This is a small project I created for the Brackey's Game Jam 8 and I had 1 week to create it, so don't expect a AAA gameplay here alright haha!

The goal of this game is to find the exit in the shortest amount of time possible while battling multiple types of enemies! Please note that I have not implemented any type of Save & Load functionality so your progress will be lost after exiting the game!

Huge thanks to everyone who have created the Assets for this game!

Music: https://crossedkiller.itch.io/dungeon-music

SFX created in:  SFXR

Tiles: https://pixel-poem.itch.io/dungeon-assetpuck

If you have any suggestions on this game, please leave them down below so that I can ignore them :) 

Just kidding, I love you all. But I will most likely not be continuing updating this game but any type of suggestions otherwise helps alot!!!

SOURCE CODE!!!
